title: Carrot2 clustering time logging
description: It may be useful to log the amount of time Carrot2 spent on clustering. This should be helpful when debugging performance issues.

comments.author: Stanislaw Osinski
comments.content: An initial patch. I'm not sure what Solr's logging policies are, feel free to change the level as appropriate.

comments.author: Erik Hatcher
comments.content: Stanislaw - how does this differ from the output debugQuery=true provides on the component timings?  Isn't that sufficient?

comments.author: Stanislaw Osinski
comments.content: Hi Erik! You're right, debugQuery should be enough for most cases. Resolving as invalid.
